CallDeviceActionAsync.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iotvideo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CallDeviceActionAsync
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DeviceName": "xxx_76854689_1",
    "InputParams": "{\"test_para1\":22}",
    "ActionId": "test_action",
    "ProductId": "L78xxxxZ95"
}
CallDeviceActionAsync.title: 异步调用设备行为

CreateProduct.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iotvideo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateProduct
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ProductDescription": "test",
    "Features": [
        "test1"
    ],
    "ChipId": "chip1",
    "ProductName": "test",
    "DeviceType": 1,
    "ProductVaildYears": 1,
    "ChipManufactureId": "x86",
    "ChipOs": "linux",
    "EncryptionType": 2,
    "NetType": "wifi"
}
CreateProduct.title: 创建产品

GenSingleDeviceSignatureOfPublic.document: 生成单个设备绑定的签名, 一般用于APP绑定设备
GenSingleDeviceSignatureOfPublic.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iotvideo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GenSingleDeviceSignatureOfPublic
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DeviceName": "test_76854689_1",
    "Expire": "86400",
    "ProductId": "L78ASO6Z95"
}
GenSingleDeviceSignatureOfPublic.title: 生成单个设备绑定的签名
